title: Colorations Washable Clear Glue, 1 Gallon, Dries Clear, Gluing, Crafts, School Glue, Home Glue, Office Glue, Craft Projects, Washable Glue, Non Toxic Glue, Homeschool, Home School Use
description: Colorations (R) Washable Clear Glue that dries clear, nontoxic, and very washable! Great for making slime, art projects and collaging! Value size and acid free this glue is ideal for school, home and office. Great for Homeschool, or home school use for art projects and experiments.
